thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 29 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Bank Of Communications Co Posts FY Net Profit Attributable Of RMB 70,223 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Bank Of Communications Co Posts FY Net Profit Attributable Of RMB 70,223 Million

organizations.name: reuters) - bank of communications co ltd

text:
March 29 (Reuters) - Bank Of Communications Co Ltd :
* FY NET PROFIT ATTRIBUTABLE RMB 70,223 MILLION VERSUS RMB67,210 MILLION
* AS AT DEC 31, 2017 CAPITAL ADEQUACY RATIO 14.00 PERCENT * FY NET INTEREST INCOME RMB ‍127,366 MILLION VERSUS RMB 134,871 MILLION​
* BANK OF COMMUNICATIONS -FY NET INTEREST SPREAD & NET INTEREST MARGIN DECREASED BY 31 & 30 BASIS POINTS YOY BASIS TO 1.44% AND 1.58%, RESPECTIVELY
* AS AT DEC 31, 2017 IMPAIRED LOAN RATIO 1.50 PERCENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
